intro: Sponia africana, commonly known as the African sponia, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Acanthaceae and is characterized by its erect, branching stems and showy, tubular flowers. The plant produces small, capsule-like fruits that contain numerous seeds.
